open_risks: Residual forced deleveraging from gold/silver volatility reappears (margin calls / higher margins / liquidity gaps), spilling into equities (esp. high-beta) and credit via VAR-driven de-grossing.
Rates re-acceleration regime: strong ISM keeps upward pressure on yields/real yields, compressing equity duration multiples (NQ vulnerability) even if headline indices look stable.
Data-gap / policy uncertainty from shutdown: delayed NFP and other BLS releases raise dispersion in Fed-path expectations; smaller data and speakers can create outsized curve moves.
AI concentration/idiosyncratic shock: NVDA sentiment hit from OpenAI inference-chip alternative search broadens into semis/AI complex and drags NQ via index concentration.

Front-end liquidity/cash-drain optics: higher targeted TGA and refunding/issuance details tighten money-market conditions at the margin (bills/repo), indirectly pressuring risk assets if financial conditions re-tighten.
